keyMoments.description: Pandaman appears as a background member of the Black Cat Pirates during the battle at the northern coast.
Captain Kuro reveals his plan to kill all of the Black Cat Pirates after obtaining Kaya's fortune, shocking the crew with his complete betrayal.
Many Black Cat Pirates are severely wounded when Kuro uses his Shakushi technique indiscriminately, attacking his own crew members along with Luffy.

crewChanges.description: Kuro reveals his intention to kill his entire crew and actively wounds them with his Shakushi technique, marking the beginning of the crew's dissolution.

keyMoments.description: The Usopp Pirates (Piiman, Tamanegi, and Ninjin) escort Kaya through the forest while fleeing from Jango.
The Usopp Pirates attempt to ambush Jango with traps and weapons, demonstrating their bravery despite being outmatched.
The Usopp Pirates are threatened with death by Jango, prompting Kaya to sacrifice herself by agreeing to sign the will to save them.
